data.description: Provides students with fundamental skills in combining had printed and digital output.  Hybrid print integrates laser plate, monoprint, collograph, stencil, stamping, and embossment with inkjet output.  Focuses on enhancement of digital output through integration of hand printed elements.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO DIGITAL PRINTMAKING

data.description: Advanced computer imaging for printmaking. Emphasis is on self-initiated projects that combine printmaking or photographic techniques with digital output.
data.title: COMPUTER AUGMENTED PRINTMAKING

data.description: An introduction to a range of digital media techniques for artists and designers, including digital imaging, vector graphics, web design and 3D digital modeling.  Emphasis on creative development along with technical skill building.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO DIGITAL FORMS
